0.text: It's yellow and sweet. It has a shape of a ball. We make it using flour, butter and sugar. We make it for our new year. What is it?
0.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>It's <break time='200ms'/> yellow <break time='200ms'/> and <break time='200ms'/> sweet. <break time='200ms'/> It <break time='200ms'/> has <break time='200ms'/> a <break time='200ms'/> shape <break time='200ms'/> of <break time='200ms'/> a <break time='200ms'/> ball. <break time='200ms'/> We <break time='200ms'/> make <break time='200ms'/> it <break time='200ms'/> using <break time='200ms'/> flour, <break time='200ms'/> butter <break time='200ms'/> and <break time='200ms'/> sugar. <break time='200ms'/> We <break time='200ms'/> make <break time='200ms'/> it <break time='200ms'/> for <break time='200ms'/> our <break time='200ms'/> new <break time='200ms'/> year. <break time='200ms'/> What <break time='200ms'/> is <break time='200ms'/> it? <break time='200ms'/></prosody></speak>

1.text: It's very sweet and brown in colour. It's square in shape. It's a favourite dessert. We make it using eggs and Kithul jaggery. We make it for Ramazan. What is it?
1.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>It's <break time='200ms'/> very <break time='200ms'/> sweet <break time='200ms'/> and <break time='200ms'/> brown <break time='200ms'/> in <break time='200ms'/> colour. <break time='200ms'/> It's <break time='200ms'/> square <break time='200ms'/> in <break time='200ms'/> shape. <break time='200ms'/> It's <break time='200ms'/> a <break time='200ms'/> favourite <break time='200ms'/> dessert. <break time='200ms'/> We <break time='200ms'/> make <break time='200ms'/> it <break time='200ms'/> using <break time='200ms'/> eggs <break time='200ms'/> and <break time='200ms'/> Kithul <break time='200ms'/> jaggery. <break time='200ms'/> We <break time='200ms'/> make <break time='200ms'/> it <break time='200ms'/> for <break time='200ms'/> Ramazan. <break time='200ms'/> What <break time='200ms'/> is <break time='200ms'/> it? <break time='200ms'/></prosody></speak>

2.text: Ask the students to describe other food items related to their colour and shape. The other students should guess the food item.
2.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>Ask <break time='200ms'/> the <break time='200ms'/> students <break time='200ms'/> to <break time='200ms'/> describe <break time='200ms'/> other <break time='200ms'/> food <break time='200ms'/> items <break time='200ms'/> related <break time='200ms'/> to <break time='200ms'/> their <break time='200ms'/> colour <break time='200ms'/> and <break time='200ms'/> shape. <break time='200ms'/> The <break time='200ms'/> other <break time='200ms'/> students <break time='200ms'/> should <break time='200ms'/> guess <break time='200ms'/> the <break time='200ms'/> food <break time='200ms'/> item. <break time='200ms'/></prosody></speak>

3.text: Have a 'guess and tell game' in your class.
3.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>Have <break time='200ms'/> a <break time='200ms'/> 'guess <break time='200ms'/> and <break time='200ms'/> tell <break time='200ms'/> game' <break time='200ms'/> in <break time='200ms'/> your <break time='200ms'/> class. <break time='200ms'/></prosody></speak>
